head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CURTIS, DR. PRUDENCE B. (PRUDY)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CURTIS, DR. PRUDENCE B. (PRUDY)

block.p: CURTIS-Dr. Prudence B. (Prudy). On Sunday, August 20, 2000; of Elizabeth, NJ. Loving daughter of Anne B. Curtis; loving sister of Gale Curtis, Lorna Lee Curtis and Melissa Curtis; aunt of John Lee Curtis; brother-in-law of Robert Rogoshewski; longtime friend of Lucas Tsilifonis. Relatives and friends are kindly invited to attend the Service of Resurrection at First Presbyterian Church, Main Street, Orange, NJ, on Tuesday, August 22, at 11 AM. Memorials may be sent to the First Presbyterian Church, c/o Music Fund, Main St. and Scotland Rd, Orange, NJ 07050. A reception will follow in the Fellowship Hall. For more information, contact the August F. Schmidt Memorial Funeral Home, 139 Westfield Ave, Elizabeth, NJ.
